title: "AI Search Art"
content:
ðŸ‘‹ Welcome to our website! We are a modern and minimalist search engine powered by AI. Our goal is to provide you with the most relevant and accurate results for your queries, all while presenting them in a sleek and visually appealing way.

Our abstract illustration of an AI-powered search engine serves as the perfect backdrop for our platform. It represents the cutting-edge technology that we use to deliver the best possible search experience to our users.

Whether you're looking for information on a specific topic or just browsing for inspiration, our search engine will help you find what you need quickly and easily. So why wait? Start exploring today and see what our AI-powered search engine can do for you!

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A wallpaper featuring an abstract illustration of an AI-powered search engine, with a minimalist and modern design."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
